If you want to know how to shape and maintain a beard, remember to always manage stress in healthy ways. Yes, beards will quicker when you keep yourself healthy. Therefore, to keep those beards growing, try to exercise and manage stress. 
In fact, according to experts exercise will help your body to circulate blood which will help promoting facial hair growth. If you want to keep your hair healthy, you need nutrients in your body so do not forget to eat veggies and fruits. They will not just provide you with several vitamins for your hair but also keeps your body strong and healthy. In this article, you will discover how to maintain an awesome beard and several steps how to avoid irritation. 
Facial hair grooming 
Let your facial hair grow for about 4 up to 6 months before grooming them. It is really irritating at first, but you will have your chance. Facial hair will not grow at the same pace and it is really irritating. There are times that you really want to shave them off because of itching especially at the lower part of your jaw. Using facial hair conditioner will help you to avoid rashes and itching. You can ask a doctor if you want to use a hydrocortisone cream. But, keep in mind that this type of cream may have negative side effects. Therefore, you should always consult your doctor before applying this type of cream. Shampoos that you are using for your head is also ideal for the beard to achieve soft and less skin irritation. 
Trimmer 
Invest some of your fortunes buying facial hair trimmer. It will help you to keep that awesome masculine looks. Also, if you decided to get rid of your beard, the easiest way to do that is to use facial hair trimmer. Facial hair trimmer allows your beard in good shape and you can easily achieve that Tony Stark look that you always wanted. There will come into a situation that youâ€™ll become ambitious about styling your beard. To avoid possible mistake, seek professionals about this matter.Check out wisebeards.com for some good trimmers. 
Moisturizer 
Your neck will suffer from skin irritation and rashes because of the angle where the beard meets the neck. You can avoid annoyance by applying ample amounts of facial hair moisturizer. But, you have to avoid moisturizing products that contain alcohol. 
Goat Scruff Softener 
This type of solution is specially designed to help those irritating facial hair to become softer and kissable. There are lots of facial hair shampoos, conditioners and softeners available in the market. We have our own different perspective so use the type of solution you really enjoy and fit your budget. 
Patience is virtue 
Bear in mind that beards are not actually measured by its length but rather it is measured in months. Facial hair will always depend on your genes. If you tried to wonder why this guy can grow his beard faster compared to you, it is because different people have their own different genetic factor. The length will not depend on how long you are keeping those beards.
